item.title: 最安全的做法是暂时停火
item.description:
在关税问题解决之前，美国市场不知道该何去何从。因此，请看看德国和加纳。【原文：

US markets won’t know where to go until tariffs are settled. So look at Germany and Ghana.

】

item.title: 关税威胁市场反弹，新加坡房屋销售降温
item.description: 新加坡 3 月份的新房销售量有所下降，更有早期迹象表明，蓬勃发展的住宅市场正在失去动力。【原文：Singapore’s new home sales fell in March, adding to early signs that the booming residential market is losing steam.】

item.title: 科技界的 "僵尸独角兽 "走到了尽头
item.description:
关税动荡让泡沫时代的初创企业面临财政纪律问题。这不是坏事。【原文：

Tariff turmoil puts fiscal discipline on the table for bubble-era startups. That’s no bad thing.   

】

item.title: Stellantis 投资者对前首席执行官支付 2,310 万欧元感到愤怒
item.description: Stellantis NV 的投资者正在反击这家汽车制造商的薪酬做法，该公司前首席执行官卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯（Carlos Tavares）在销售和盈利下降的一年里获得了 2,310 万欧元（2,620 万美元）的薪酬。【原文：Stellantis NV investors are pushing back against the automaker’s remuneration practices that awarded former Chief Executive Officer Carlos Tavares €23.1 million ($26.2 million) for a year of declining sales and earnings.】

item.title: 台湾利率掉期折让创纪录 兑现宽松承诺
item.description: 台湾的短期利率掉期与当地货币市场基准的贴水幅度最大，这加深了美国关税促使岛内对货币宽松政策下更大赌注的异常现象。【原文：Taiwan’s short-term interest rate swaps are at the widest discount to the local money market benchmark, deepening an anomaly as US tariffs prompted stronger bets on monetary easing on the island.】

item.title: 在关税影响下，日本超长收益率溢价为 2002 年以来最宽
item.description: 由于全球动荡和财政问题导致超长收益率上升，投资者要求持有日本 30 年期国债的溢价已扩大到 20 多年来的最高水平，超过 5 年期国债。【原文：The premium that investors demand to hold Japan’s 30-year government bonds over five-year notes has widened to the most in over two decades as global volatility and fiscal concerns drive up super-long yields.】

item.title: 瑞银下调中国 2025 年经济增长预测
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS AG）在一系列下调中国经济增长评级的声明中，又一次做出了主要银行中最悲观的预测，预计由于美国关税抑制出口，中国经济今年将仅增长 3.4%。【原文：UBS AG added to a series of growth downgrades for China with the most pessimistic forecast among major banks, predicting the economy will expand just 3.4% this year as US tariffs choke exports.】

item.title: 政策不确定性导致国债定期溢价跃升至十年新高
item.description: 由于担心特朗普政府不可预测的关税政策会削弱投资者对美国政府债券的信心，持有 10 年期国债的风险溢价已攀升至十年来的最高点。【原文：The risk premium to hold 10-year Treasuries has climbed to the highest in a decade on concern the Trump administration’s unpredictable tariff policy will sap investor confidence in US government bonds.】

item.title: 关税延长亚洲交易低迷期，韩国企业推迟债券销售
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税政策导致市场剧烈波动，韩国公司正推迟美元债券销售，这加剧了中国以外亚洲新交易的枯竭。【原文：South Korean companies are delaying dollar bond sales as President Donald Trump’s tariff policies cause wild swings in markets, exacerbating a dry spell in new Asian deals outside of China.】

item.title: 耶伦称特朗普关税政策有误导性，并警告存在不确定性
item.description: 前财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）说，唐纳德-特朗普总统关税政策的理由 "不明确，而且完全不合情理"，她还补充说，她相信中国希望 "缓和这场冲突"。【原文：Former Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said the rationale for President Donald Trump’s tariff policies was “unclear and not at all sensible,” adding she believes China would like to “de-escalate this conflict.”】

item.title: 印度医药股在特朗普关税前的调查中不再是藏身之地
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 建筑商融创寻求将所有海外债券转换为股票
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国建筑商融创中国控股有限公司（Sunac China Holdings Ltd.）正在与一些主要债权人商讨将其所有离岸债券转换为股权的计划，因为该公司在持续的流动性问题下正着手进行第二次债务重组。【原文：Chinese builder Sunac China Holdings Ltd. is discussing with some major creditors a plan to convert all of its offshore bonds into equity, according to people familiar with the matter, as it embarks on a second debt restructuring amid persistent liquidity problems.】

item.title: 星空娱乐亏损，称收入持续下降
item.description: 星空娱乐集团有限公司（Star Entertainment Group Ltd.）终于发布了拖延已久的上半年财报，财报显示该公司亏损 1.36 亿澳元（8600 万美元），旗下各赌场的经营状况继续恶化。【原文：Star Entertainment Group Ltd. finally released its long-delayed first-half results, showing it posted a A$136 million ($86 million) loss and that trading conditions continue to deteriorate across its casinos.】

item.title: 日本为特朗普与盟国达成协议的胃口提供试金石
item.description: 日本将于本周与美国举行会谈，这将考验唐纳德-特朗普总统是否准备好达成贸易协议，以及作为亲密盟友在谈判桌上是否有分量。【原文：Japan is set for talks with the US this week that will test whether President Donald Trump is ready to strike trade deals — and whether being a close ally will carry any weight at the negotiating table.】

item.title: 关税拖累 AMRO 亚洲经济增长前景降至自 Covid 以来最弱
item.description: 据一家地区研究机构称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的全球关税将使亚洲的经济增长降至自19世纪科维德大流行以来的最弱水平。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s global tariffs would cut Asia’s economic growth to the weakest since the Covid-19 pandemic, according to a regional research group.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴支持的人工智能初创公司智璞目标最快于 2025 年上市
item.description: 智付已邀请中国国际金融有限公司（China International Capital Corp）牵头，最快将于今年进行首次公开募股，力争成为几家著名的 ChatGPT 竞争对手中首家进入公开市场的公司。【原文：Zhipu has enlisted China International Capital Corp. to spearhead an initial public offering as soon as this year, angling to become the first of several prominent ChatGPT-competitors to tap public markets.】

item.title: 前官员称日本央行可能暂时搁置加息计划
item.description: 据一位前执行董事称，由于美国的关税措施可能会对日本经济造成打击，因此存在不确定性，日本央行可能会暂时搁置加息。【原文：The Bank of Japan will probably leave aside raising interest rates for now due to uncertainties stemming from US tariff measures that could deal a blow to Japan’s economy, according to a former executive director.】

item.title: 据说台湾竞购者正在围攻 AMD ZT 服务器资产
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，仁宝电子公司、纬创资通附属公司 Wiwynn Corp.和美国捷普公司（Jabil Inc.【原文：Compal Electronics Inc., Wistron Corp. affiliate Wiwynn Corp. and US company Jabil Inc. are set to submit revised offers for Advanced Micro Devices Inc.’s AI server assembly plants, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 台湾与 Astranis 计划利用互联网卫星消除停电威胁
item.description: 美国一家卫星初创公司将发射第一颗专门用于台湾的通信卫星，这将加强台湾这个自治民主国家的抵御能力，以防中国在入侵台湾时企图实施信息封锁。【原文：A US satellite startup will launch the first communications satellite dedicated to Taiwan, strengthening the self-ruled democracy’s resilience against possible Chinese attempts to impose an information blackout in the event of an invasion.】

item.title: 中国与美国脱钩导致主要石油产品贸易崩溃
item.description: 中国以一系列令人瞠目的征税来回应美国的关税才刚刚过去几天，但石油市场的一个角落已经陷入危机，因为这两个重量级国家之间的双边贸易崩溃了。【原文：It’s been just days since China responded to US tariffs with its own set of eye-watering levies, but one corner of the petroleum market is already in crisis as bilateral trade collapses between the two heavyweights.】

item.title: 耐克将在中国新建上海工作室
item.description: 耐克公司将在上海开设一家新的创意工作室，这家全球最大的运动服装公司将向其最重要的市场之一进行投资。【原文：Nike Inc. is opening a new creative studio in Shanghai as the world’s largest sportswear company pumps investment into one of its most crucial markets.】

item.title: 韩国公布经济刺激计划，关税小组准备美国之行
item.description: 韩国公布了一项 12 万亿韩元（约合 84 亿美元）的补充预算计划，以支撑该国受到唐纳德-特朗普关税威胁的依赖出口的经济，韩国官员正准备前往美国谈判降低关税。【原文：South Korea unveiled a 12 trillion won ($8.4 billion) supplementary budget plan to shore up the country’s export-reliant economy threatened by Donald Trump’s tariffs as officials prepare to head to the US to negotiate a lower duty.】

item.title: 中国制造玩具亿万富翁称关税将使美国玩具价格翻番
item.description: 玩具业亿万富翁尼克-莫伯雷（Nick Mowbray）说，唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税令他的公司 "瘫痪"，别无选择，只能提高在美国的零售价格。【原文：Toy billionaire Nick Mowbray said President Donald Trump’s tariffs have “paralyzed” his company and left it with little choice but to pump up retail prices in the US.】

item.title: 印度 UPI 支付平台目标新增 3 亿用户
item.description: 印度计划为其实时支付系统 "统一支付接口"（Unified Payments Interface）带来数以亿计的新用户，同时将该平台推广到海外。【原文：India plans to bring hundreds of millions of new users onto Unified Payments Interface, its real-time payments system, while pitching the platform for wider adoption overseas.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行称五月会议是重新审视政策的 "恰当时机
item.description: 澳大利亚央行在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）掀起关税浪潮之前召开了四月份会议，根据会议记录，澳大利亚央行对未来的降息表示谨慎，称五月将是重新审视政策设置的 "合适时机"。【原文：Australia’s central bank expressed caution over future interest-rate cuts, saying May would be an “opportune time” to revisit policy settings, according to minutes of its April meeting that was held just before US President Donald Trump’ unleashed a wave of tariffs that have roiled global markets.】

item.title: 亚洲汽车股因特朗普暂缓加征关税的迹象而反弹
item.description: 周二，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示正在考虑对进口汽车和汽车零部件实行关税豁免后，亚洲汽车制造商的股价攀升。【原文：Shares of Asian carmakers climbed Tuesday after US President Donald Trump said he was considering tariff exemptions on imported vehicles and auto parts.】

item.title: 首席执行官解释如何在 3 亿美元崩溃中伪造业绩
item.description:
Agritech风险企业eFishery曾是亚洲最耀眼的初创企业之一，获得了软银和淡马锡等机构的资金支持。然后一切都轰然倒塌了。【原文：

Agritech venture eFishery was one of Asia’s brightest startups with money from the likes of SoftBank and Temasek. Then it all came crashing down.

】

item.title: 日本加藤称不会在债券收益率飙升之际追加预算
item.description: 日本财务大臣排除了编制额外预算的想法，回击了推高日本国债收益率的市场猜测。【原文：Japanese Finance Minister ruled out the idea of compiling an extra budget, pushing back against market speculation that has driven up the nation’s government bond yields.】

item.title: 美联储博斯蒂克强调耐心，称现在不是大胆行动的时候
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）强调，在调整利率之前，官员们必须等待唐纳德-特朗普总统的政策进一步明朗化。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic emphasized officials must wait for further clarity on President Donald Trump’s policies before adjusting interest rates.】

item.title: 贸易战忧虑升温，黄金在历史记录下方企稳
item.description: 由于美国征收更多关税的计划激起了投资者的焦虑情绪，黄金坚挺在本周开盘创下的纪录高位下方。【原文：Gold held firm just below a record high set in the week’s opening session as US plans to impose more tariffs stoked investor anxiety.】
